channel.title: Differential Expression on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in Differential Expression on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 8: Volcano Plot Mastery!
item.description: Transform your differential expression results into compelling volcano plots that tell clear biological stories. Discover the color coding strategy that emphasizes statistical confidence first, advanced interactive techniques, and how to avoid the common pitfalls that make volcano plots unreadable.

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 7: Differential Expression Analysis!
item.description: The climactic moment of RNA-seq analysis! Discover how DESeq2’s three-step statistical process identifies truly differentially expressed genes, learn to interpret results like a pro, and avoid the common pitfalls that can derail your biological discoveries.

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 2: DESeq2 Fundamentals
item.description: Demystify DESeq2’s statistical framework with clear explanations designed for both experimentalists and bioinformaticians. Discover why count data requires specialized methods and how DESeq2’s approach transforms messy RNA-seq data into trustworthy biological insights.

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 1: Introduction
item.description: Discover the complete roadmap for mastering bulk RNA-seq analysis in R. This series introduction outlines a 10-post journey from foundational concepts to advanced applications, building on genomic data structures to solve real biological questions through differential expression analysis.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 1: Introduction to Bulk RNA-Seq Analysis
item.description: Explore the fundamentals of bulk RNA-Seq analysis, from FASTQ files to differential gene expression. Learn about the tools and methods that drive transcriptomic research.
